code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u0418\u043D\u0444\u043E\u0440\u043C\u0430\u0446\u0438\u044F \u043F\u043E \u0440\u0430\u0441\u0448\u0438\u0440\u0435\u043D\u0438\u044F\u043C 1\u0421"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:location.pathname==='/'?'nav-link active':'nav-link',children:"\u0413\u043B\u0430\u0432\u043D\u0430\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/settings",className:location.pathname==='/settings'?'nav-link active':'nav-link',children:"\u041D\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043E\u0439\u043A\u0438"})]})]})});};export default Header;
